channel.title: Help me with this please :(
channel.description: How do i make it say: Owner and Coder Victoria has just loged in? :(

item.title: Help me with this please :(
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:2, topic:152674”]Go to your login message like

“+playerName+” has just logged in, there is now 20 players online. Or w.e it says.

Underneath, put…

if (playerRights == 3)
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Owner / Coder Victoria has just logged in!”;

Iddk, dont do that kinda stuff[/quote]
kinda off topic but oh well i just wanna point you used the +playername+ code which works the same as +player+ so you can teleblock people

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with this please :(
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“zezimaisme111, post:4, topic:152674”]eaiser way…
find something like this…

//PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has logged in! There is now "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players.";

and under that put

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) ]//PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has logged in! There is now "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players.";
but separate the 2 by } like this…

//PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has logged in! There is now "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players."; } if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) ]//PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has logged in! There is now "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players."; } }[/quote]

Dat r ripped out of client. And if you add 2 }'s, to the end of that code, wont it give errors? Because there is no {'s

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with this please :(
item.dc:creator: @Dr3w Dr3w
item.description:
@Dr3w wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:2, topic:152674”]Go to your login message like

“+playerName+” has just logged in, there is now 20 players online. Or w.e it says.

Underneath, put…

if (playerRights == 3)
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Owner / Coder Victoria has just logged in!”;

Iddk, dont do that kinda stuff[/quote]

Adding else ifs to tell when their off line is another great thing to add to NPCs insted of when you log in that is all done in the NPCHandler.java. To find it search “Moo” and you should come down to the section that holds all the npc talking stuff. Start a new line saying

you can steal this from another talking just change the NPC id`s to your NPC ID you want to say it and what it says to Victoria Coder is Online and add an else if stating if shes offline saying Victoria Coder is Offline
that is how it works. Done it many times.

Read full topic

find something like this…

and under that put

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) ]//PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has logged in! There is now "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players.";
but separate the 2 by } like this…
